name: A Shooter with speed and health settings (sorry for the bad name)
name_original: A Shooter with speed and health settings (sorry for the bad name)
description:
This is a game made for the third Blackthornprod game jam with the theme "less is more". In the menu there is a slider that controlles if you have less health but more speed or less speed but more health. So less of one is more of the other.

the game itself is simple just shoot red things and get to the blue thing.

enjoy

(I dont know if the mac os version works even in the slightest)
